name: LocalHoes: Dating app powered by FetLife. By Aiden Valentine <3
description: This is a dating app for FetLife users. For singles, poly couples, professional photographers and models to build their network. Features a REST API. So we can power tools like Bulk Follow/Unfollow, Bulk Messaging. And features a search engine to search/sort users -- one much more powerful than their on-site tool.
author: Alex Corsmeier <dollsofink@gmail.com>
